title: Kids getting cockier?
body:
I know LoL has always been a toxic community full of cocky arrogant little kids but is it getting worse or is it just Oceania.

I remember before I transferred from NA at the end of a game people would all just say good game, well played.... since moving here it's all 'Ez' 'Too Ez' 'Get Skill' 'Rekt' and all the other bullshit slang kids use these days.

Maybe I am just old and politeness is out the door.

replies.body:
Those kids are just lil punks that think that because they won a game their the next faker, when really their just bronze 5 twelves who were matched with challengers to actually get to the higher level bronze 5's mmr.

Don't pay any attention to em.
I can't escape Bronze cause I'm stuck with em haha

Hey Kido.

I was stuck in the same situation and I ask a mate if they could duo with me to get be to bronze 1 promos and I said "If I can't get out of this by myself don't help me again." Well the m8 I asked was a Diamond at the time but now master. So he got me to the promos making sure I did my part well and not just relayed on him and well I got lucky made it to silver 5 by solo and never ranked again. (well once a month I do but that's it)

I've already done that still sadly there are those odds you get people who literally feed and afk in promos. I happen to be in those games. The casual enemy team gets first blood and there's that 1 guy who says gg and leaves.

Dude, I have disabled all chat so i dunno if this is the reason, at the end game screen i always say 'ggwp all', or compliment a player who plays someone that rarely gets touched etc. I haven't got a 'ggwp all' back in about 3 months. Not sure if this is the reason or if people are just rude. I think OCE are just egotistical children in normals or angry trick2g crybaby wannabes in ranked.

NA is just as bad.

It's primarily because in the past few months, a lot of threads have popped up about this behavior, and being the little edgy community we are (in general), know this ticks off most people, inciting a reaction a troll wants.

Ikr, they only just win because someone on your team dc at last min, then you have these little scrubby (better not to say anything else) who just spam "Ez, Get Skill, Rekt, Too gud 4 u nubz" even though it was a 50 minute game and they only won because of a dc. These children need to learn some manners. Schools should be teaching some sort of politeness, this world's kids have only gotten ever more toxic over the years, and it all starts from bad influence from other students in schools.

I agree with you, and see what you are talking about first hand five days a week, most weeks. Being a school captain, I observe a lot more than the average student, and I can tell you now, in the next 10 years, it won't get any better. All the kids are little shi.ts with no more than half a brain or any knowledge of acceptable communication strategies. We even had to have a "Formal Etiquette" lesson in the lead up to our graduation dinner this week. 20 years ago that never would have existed, because it was just known. Not anymore, though. Now, apparently, every parent just lets their kids go out in shopping centres on their own, handing them their credit card and saying "do whatever the fuc.k you want". This needs to stop in society. Kids need to realise that being a shi.t will get them nowhere, and the kids that get the good grades get them in part due to their behaviour.
